newsStories.title: Unemployment Rate Falls to 3.9%, Lowest Since 2000
newsStories.author: By NATALIE KITROEFF
newsStories.info1: With 164,000 jobs added in April, it was the 91st consecutive month of gains, far and away the longest streak of increases on record
